name: [WIP] Pixel Hop
description:
Hi, my name is Lilin!

This is my first attempt on making a simple game. I used the Godot-Engine for this and i really like the engine.

This prototype only has 1 level because i wanted to ask you guys if there are some people who would enjoy playing some kind of games. I really like making this game and i hope you like this tiny level ^^ Please give me feedback and suggestions on what else I could add. Please do not hesitate to criticize this project. I would like to improve and complete this project one day.

Thanks to 0x72 for this cool-looking player model :D
